meanings.definition: Sloppy or untidy in appearance or habits.
meanings.sent1: She was the slobbiest student in the class, always forgetting her homework.
meanings.sent2: The room looked slobbiest after the kids had finished playing.
meanings.sent3: His slobbiest outfit made everyone laugh at the party.
meanings.sent4: The slobbiest corner of the house was the neglected attic.
meanings.sent5: The slobbiest dog in the neighborhood had fur all over the furniture.

meanings.definition: The superlative form of 'sloppy', indicating the most untidy or messy.
meanings.sent1: She won the award for being the slobbiest in the office.
meanings.sent2: The slobbiest in the family always left a mess in the kitchen.
meanings.sent3: The slobbiest at the party was the one who spilled the punch.
meanings.sent4: The slobbiest of all the rooms was the basement, cluttered with old boxes.
meanings.sent5: The slobbiest in the competition had stains on their shirt.
